job_description: The Energy Systems and Infrastructure Assessment (ESIA) division provides the rationale for decision makers to improve energy efficiency. We develop and use analytic tools to help the U.S. achieve energy goals. ESIA also develops, deploy, and advance grid technologies that ensure a robust and secure U.S. grid transmission and distribution system.
